game.shortDescriptionEn: Experience two unique adventures featuring both long-time heroes and new and returning villains as they battle for the fate of the world!

reviewHighlights.text: [h1]Предисловие[/h1] [i]Успех первого Adventure не только вернул разработчикам уверенность в будущем, но уверенность боссов SEGA в дальнейшем развитии...
One of THE BEST Sonic games ever! Played it as a kid, enjoyed it as a teen, love it as an adult! If your new to Sonic, start with this game.
